jobs.name: Sina 5AM Wake-Up Call
jobs.description: Morning motivation message at 4:55 AM. Includes today's Todoist tasks, a reminder of your achievements (Global Talent Visa, PhD journey), ML tip of the day, and a quick win suggestion to start the day strong.

jobs.name: Clawdbot X Digest
jobs.description: Daily summary of Clawdbot mentions on X/Twitter. Searches for posts about Clawdbot, Moltbot, and OpenClaw, organizes by category, and suggests post ideas for you to engage with the community.

jobs.name: ML Research Updates
jobs.description: Bi-weekly (Monday & Thursday) scan of latest ML/deep learning papers. Focuses on PyTorch, LSTM, TCN, time series forecasting - topics relevant to your water engineering ML work. Extracts key insights and explains why they matter for CSO prediction.

jobs.name: Weekly Security Audit
jobs.description: Monday 2 PM security check. Scans for open ports, failed SSH logins, file permission issues, and potential API key exposures. Reports findings by risk level (Critical/High/Medium/Low) with recommended fixes.

jobs.name: Gym Accountability
jobs.description: Monday/Wednesday/Friday at 5 PM - gym reminder. Checks Todoist for workout plan, suggests a routine if none exists, and asks you to confirm when done. Pushes harder if you've missed gym sessions that week.

jobs.name: Bedtime Reminder
jobs.description: 9:30 PM wind-down reminder. Reviews what you completed today vs what's still open in Todoist. Lists tomorrow's top 3 priorities so you wake up with a clear plan. Encourages quality sleep for the 5 AM wake-up.

jobs.name: Nightly Build
jobs.description: 3 AM innovation time. While you sleep, I build something new and surprising - tools, visualizations, automations. Picks from the IDEAS.md backlog, builds it, commits to repo, and delivers it when you wake up. Goal: make you smile every morning.

jobs.name: Scholar Paper Downloader
jobs.description: Every 2 days at 10 AM. Checks Google Scholar alert emails for new papers from Water Research and Journal of Hydrology. Downloads open-access PDFs automatically and sends you a summary of what's new in your field.

jobs.name: AI Trending News
jobs.description: Every 2 days at 10 AM. Collects trending AI/ML news from key accounts (@karpathy, @OpenAI, @AnthropicAI, etc.). Filters for last 48 hours only. Organizes into categories: breaking news, new tools, research highlights, learning resources.

jobs.name: Coin Bureau Checker
jobs.description: Every 3 days at noon. Checks Coin Bureau YouTube channel for new videos. If a new video is found, creates a 2-3 paragraph summary of key crypto/finance insights and sends it to you. Avoids duplicate summaries.

jobs.name: Midweek Confidence Boost
jobs.description: Wednesday noon check-in. Not about tasks - about YOU. Reminds you of your journey (PhD, Global Talent Visa, 36 papers). Asks about wins this week, what's blocking you, and your energy level. Support-focused, not task-focused.

jobs.name: Friday Happiness Check
jobs.description: Friday 6 PM emotional check-in. Asks how your week was (1-10), what made you smile, what drained you. Uses the 'Three Good Things' exercise. Weekend planning - rest if exhausted, gentle nudge if energized. About happiness, not hustle.

jobs.name: Weekend Contract Hunt
jobs.description: Saturday 9 AM job search. Scans Upwork, LinkedIn Jobs, and Indeed UK for AI automation, Python, and ML contracts. Filters for remote/part-time suitable for side work. Sends you 3-5 best matches with pitch suggestions and direct apply links.

jobs.name: Sunday Week Planning
jobs.description: Sunday 7 PM planning session. Reviews last week (Todoist completion, gym, wake-ups, contract applications). Sets 3 priority goals for the new week. Shares a science-backed productivity tip. Prepares you to start Monday strong.

jobs.name: ML Weekly Deep-Dive
jobs.description: Sunday 8 PM learning session. Points you to this week's ML concept in the ml-mastery folder. Simplified explanations with code examples from water engineering context. One concept per week - consistent learning without overwhelm.
